text: 22:19 Onger Akaba 69:28; Akar Mogomem 13:8; 22:2Eghtɨ gumazitam datɨrɨghɨn ko gɨn otivamin bizibar akar akɨnafarir kamɨn itibar tam adeghtɨ, God an bizir aghuiba a dama da degham. Eghtɨ a temer ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdimɨn daghetam aman kogham, egh God baghavɨra itir nguibar ekiamɨn ikian kogham. Nguibar ekiar kam, akɨnafarir kam an gun mɨgei.”
